name: The Loss of Life, by T.I.R.
name_original: The Loss of Life, by T.I.R.
description:
An interactive piece of fiction, with 90% of the text generated by talktotransformer.com. Created for the 2019 Epic Game Jame in Switzerland (Zurich location)

JANE KUBRICK IS NOT AT ALL PRODUCED ON A PRIVATE WEB INTERNET

JANE KUBRICK IS NOT A PROFIT!

THERE ARE MORE THAN 300 MILLION PEOPLE WHO WANT TO HEAR HER SONG

The song is about people. People who need to give up their freedom and control so that "the system" can get its money back at the end of the day. But that's not what JANE KUBRICK is about. JANE KUBRICK is about taking care of one another.

But what does that mean exactly? What does her song sound like when you listen to it for one second? The answer?

Credits:

Michael Stocker: Story and Concept

Ron Morrow: Programming and Interactions

Timon Sager: Art and Design
